title: Defective
description: Eighteen months has passed since the Institute was liberated. For Allira Daniels, she’s still trying to live with the consequences of her actions. The Defective are free, but are their lives truly any better? Attacks on Defectives are on the rise, and Allira has to wonder if she’s directly responsible.  Keeping busy to escape her guilt, Allira is trying to move on, but how can she when her past is always haunting her?
author: Kayla Howarth
